title: Stepstowealth
author: Stepstowealth
content: Senator Lindsey Graham who has always not liked Russia is in the news again for a very controversial statement made during his recent visit to Ukraine in a discussion with Zelensky. "Russians are dying (...) We have never spent money so well" - Senator Lindsey Graham.This statement does not sound good to me, what do you think?Here is a link to the the news and the video.https://en.topwar.ru/218004-jeto-privodit-k-gibeli-russkih-posetivshij-kiev-amerikanskij-senator-lindsi-grjem-zajavil-ob-udachnyh-vlozhenijah-v-ukrainu.html

comments.author: paxmao
comments.body: I think this post is an example of amplification of a meaningless, probably well out of context if not plainly fabricated statement that aims to make people think that the US hates Russia. It is a perfect example of this: https://youtu.be/ZUBTyAZg5OA?t=2500No wonder you are linking a Russian site ... so obvious little troll.I have linked this video before and I plan to link specific times of it every time I find a post that so clearly seems to come from a troll farm, and I am sure I am going to get a lot of work so close to US presidentials.

comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: Quote from: Stepstowealth on May 28, 2023, 09:24:17 AMSenator Lindsey Graham who has always not liked Russia is in the news again for a very controversial statement made during his recent visit to Ukraine in a discussion with Zelensky. "Russians are dying (...) We have never spent money so well" - Senator Lindsey Graham.This statement does not sound good to me, what do you think?Here is a link to the the news and the video.https://en.topwar.ru/218004-jeto-privodit-k-gibeli-russkih-posetivshij-kiev-amerikanskij-senator-lindsi-grjem-zajavil-ob-udachnyh-vlozhenijah-v-ukrainu.htmlI think it’s a very badly chosen thing to say. Obviously Putin is breaking all kinds of rules & moral codes by invading Ukraine. Soldiers are just carrying out a job though, lots of them probably don’t agree with the war but they might not have a choice. All of the soldiers fighting on both sides have families & friends, people who care about them. It’s just a very unwise thing to say, political suicide for his career in some ways.

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: If the US had not used the CIA to upset elections in the Ukraine in 2014, a different government would be in Ukraine right now. This government would not have acted militarily against the people in the Donbas in early 2022, and Russia would not have "invaded" to protect both Russians and Ukrainians.After listening to the statements of many US "elite" about Russia, it's cleat that the US is trying to steal Russia from the Russians through an economic war, that has become a military war.If the US had stayed out of Ukraine altogether, there would be no war. Ukraine might have willingly joined Russia, like Crimea did, but at least there would have been a Ukraine of people, rather than this destruction of thousands that's going on right now.

comments.author: Hispo
comments.body: Very uncalled for, in my opinion.It does not matter if one likes or does not like a country or the politicians on that country, we should never celebrate the death of the common people who (sometimes) are forced by their own circunstancies to join the ranks of the army... I do not know about your opinion, but Putin is not Russia, the people of Russia is Russia.Hate or disagree with Putin and all his crooks of you want, but do not punch on the Russians as a whole. The fact a senator of the United States has said this is outrageous and does not help to prevent the conflict to evolve further.

The videos were on twitter, just search for it. The chances of it not being fabricated is higher.The post does not offend me. The problem is that the information is biased and comes from a source that has deleted the full context to support the fake "Russophobia" argument that is flying around from the Kremlin. There is no Russophobia  there is a problem with the Russian Federation government and Putin and Co. are trying to make it look like if this was actually a problem with the Russians, which is certainly not and you are helping spread that lie - and it looks to me that you know what you are doing.FULL DECLARATIONS HEREObviously if you are at war and there are Russian soldiers you eventually need to kill as many as possible with as little money as possible. That is the context of this.QuoteGraham said he was visiting on the 457th day of a war that Russia had assumed would be completed within three days and Graham said Ukrainians resisting the invasion reminded him of "our better selves in America. There was a time in America that we were this way, fighting to the last person, we were going to be free or die.""Now you are free," Zelenskiy responded in the encounter. "And we will be."Graham replied: "And the Russians are dying."Zelenskiy then added: "Yes, but they came to our territory. We are not fighting on their territory."Peskov and other Russian officials directly linked Graham's praise for the benefits of U.S. assistance to his comments on Russians dying in the conflict.Initial extracts of the conversation released by Zelenskiy's office had not made clear that the two remarks were made in different parts of the conversation.Peskov castigated the senator in comments to the Shot Telegram channel, saying: "It is difficult to imagine a greater shame for a country than having such senators."Russian Security Council Deputy Chairman Dmitry Medvedev called Graham, a 67-year-old Republican, an old fool.

comments.author: LTU_btc
comments.body: As usual, Russians are showing things in the way that they would look like victims. These words is taken out of context and they made it look like he said it in one sentence. It's so easy to make fake news and so many people will believe in it. Not US Senator, not Biden, not Zelensky are responsible for deaths of Russians. All responsibility goes to Putin.BTW, asses of Russians burns after these words, but when drunk Dimon Medvedev for example threatens do destroy half of world with nuclear weapons or denazify Poland, Baltic States and Finland, then everything is OK?

comments.author: Die_empty
comments.body: Let truth guide us in making our comments. The reason why Russia is rolling out its most sophisticated weapons is to kill Ukrainian. Also, the reason why NATO and the US are giving Ukraine all the assistance is not to dance with Russians but to kill them on the battlefield. Both parties are killers and murderers because thousands have died because of this senseless war. It will be unwise to judge Senator Lindsey Graham based on an incomplete video that might have been doctored. Celebrating the death of enemies is not new because that is the essence of war. When soldiers celebrate their victories in battle they do it stepping on the littered dead bodies of both soldiers and civilians. So no party should claim that they are pained by the devastation and death caused by the war. Though there are many reasons for this war Russia will always take the blame for starting the war. I am sick and tired of these accusations, this war needs to stop. Russia and Ukraine should seek peace and end these killings.
